name: Be present
description:
The simulation game about answering in an attendance roll call.

Be present is a game made for the Extra Credit Holiday 2018 Game Jam in 4 days where the theme was "present".

All the art was made by Sara Peraferrer and the programming part by Bryan and myself.

Audio and font credits.

https://freesound.org/people/unfa/sounds/181354/ https://freesound.org/people/Jacco18/sounds/419023/ https://freesound.org/people/suntemple/sounds/253177/ https://freesound.org/people/farpro/sounds/264762/ https://freesound.org/people/Timbre/sounds/166182/ Run Amok Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/1
